description: Brand-new middle school student Mato is curious about Yomi Takanashi, a classmate with an unusual family name. Mato does her best to start a conversation with the girl, but Yomi just won’t open up. Finally, though, Mato gets her chance when she and Yomi discover that they’re both proud owners of a certain picture book. This leads to Mato being invited over to Yomi’s house and that’s where they gradually get to know one another... That is until Kagari shows up; a girl in a wheelchair and Yomi’s best friend. Meanwhile, in another world, Black★Rock Shooter is engaged in a fierce battle...

titles.title: Ato Dore dake Sakebeba Ii no Darou
How Much More Do I Have to Scream?
Wie lange muss ich noch schreien?
あとどれだけ叫べばいいのだろう
